title: Attacks in Syria, Barcelona protests, flying pigs; The Week in Pictures
text:
ABC News photo editors chose the best news images of the week for this collection. </br></br>Villagers work on drying bamboo products in bunches for making chopsticks in Lijiang, China, Oct. 11, 2019. China Stringer Network/via Reuters

Workers survey a flooded area in Nagano, Japan, after Typhoon Hagibis, Oct. 14, 2019. The typhoon dropped record amounts of rain in central Japan. Kyodo News via AP

A protester protects her face from dust in front of a Spanish policemen inside El Prat airport in Barcelona, Spain, Oct. 14, 2019. Thousands of protesters took to the streets after Spain's Supreme Court sentenced Catalan separatist leaders to jail for sedition over a failed 2017 independence bid. Josep Lago/AFP/Getty Images

Firefighters battle the Sandalwood Fire as it destroys homes in the Villa Calimesa Mobile Home Park in Calimesa, Calif., Oct. 10, 2019. Burning trash dumped along a road sparked the wildfire, which destroyed dozens of homes. Jennifer Cappuccio Maher/The Orange County Register/SCNG via AP

A journalist falls on the ground during clashes between protestors and police in Barcelona, Spain, Oct. 15, 2019. Spain's Supreme Court on Monday convicted former Catalan politicians and activists for their roles in a secession bid in 2017. Emilio Morenatti/AP

A girl cries during her father's funeral in Port-au-Prince, Haiti, Oct. 16, 2019. Haitian opposition rejected President Jovenel Moise's appeal for dialogue, as the country's main cities remained paralyzed after more than a month of violent protests. Chandan Khanna/AFP/Getty Images

Rayshawn Jenkins of the Los Angeles Chargers trips as he runs with the ball past Pittsburgh Steelers cornerback Cameron Sutton, left, and free safety Minkah Fitzpatrick in the first half of a game Oct. 13, 2019, in Carson, Calif. Kyusung Gong/AP

Piglets run during the pig hurdle racing at Original Farmers Market Fall Festival in Los Angeles, Oct. 14, 2019. Li Ying//Newscom

Prince William, the Duke of Cambridge, and Catherine, the Duchess of Cambridge, arrive in Islamabad, Pakistan, Oct. 14, 2019, on the first day of their Royal Tour. I-images/i-Images/Polaris

A woman covers her face as she stands along a road on the outskirts of Tal Tamr, Syria, along the border with Turkey, Oct. 16, 2019. Smoke plumes from tire fires billow in the background to decrease visibility for Turkish warplanes that are part of operation "Peace Spring." Delil Souleiman/AFP/Getty Images

Supporters of President Donald Trump and Sen. Elizabeth Warren rally on opposite corners of an intersection near the perimeter of the fourth Democratic presidential debate, Oct. 14, 2019, in Westerville, Ohio. Chip Somodevilla/Getty Images
description: Find this week's top photos from around the globe in ABC News' This Week in Pictures slideshow
